turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Assistant, I want to order a coffee from Peet's

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which location would you like? The nearest location is 21 Jump Street in Los Angeles

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That place will do, yea

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What drink did you want me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Café au Lait coffee. Large size

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk do you want used?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's go with Whole Milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Do you want any sugar or anything added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's alright. Just the large coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And did you want anything else besides the coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of muffins do they have

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The local store has listed Blueberry, Honey Bran, and Morning Glory with Coconut muffins

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm, no, I'll pass on those. There aren't any other flavors listed?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry. It's just those three

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's alright. I'll just stick with the coffee I think

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I'll order the large Café au Lait with Whole Milk for you then. When do you want to pick it up

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Have it ready for me in 20 minutes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright. Ordering coffee now. How did you want to pay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just use the account I have set up with Peet's already

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I've ordered your coffee. I'll text you the purchase receipt now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thanks, Assistant. That's all
